snippet: The company issued 84 recalls last year covering more than 30 million vehicles in North America, at a cost of more than $2.8 billion.
abstract: General Motors offers predictions of improved pretax earnings and profit margins in fourth quarter compared to year earlier, but does not release specifics; company restates financial targets for 2016; fourth-quarter report will be released in February.
lead_paragraph: The company issued 84 recalls last year covering more than 30 million vehicles in North America, at a cost of more than $2.8 billion.

headline.main: G.M. Says It Expects Increase in Profit and Earnings in 2015
